author: Suzy Karadsheh
title: Savory Yogurt Bowls
ingredients: 1/2 cup cooked chickpeas (cooked from scratch or drained and rinsed canned chickpeas), patted dry)
instructions_list: Build the breakfast bowl. Divide the yogurt into the bottom of two serving bowls. Top with the chickpeas, egg, and veggies.
Finish and serve. Add a drizzle of good extra virgin olive oil, pinch of salt, and a good sprinkle of za’atar or dukkah. Serve or cover and refrigerate for up to 1 night.
description: This savory breakfast bowl is everything I want for busy weekdays: healthy, easy, keeps me satisfied until lunchtime, and I can prep the night before. Make on repeat all year round! Swap with seasonal vegetables and what you have on hand, and trade out the yogurt for hummus if you're looking for a dairy-free option.
